LanguageData.CurrentFoodPolicy.label: current food policy
LanguageData.CurrentFoodPolicy.headerTip: The food policy currently assigned to this pawn.
LanguageData.HomeFoodPolicy.label: home food policy
LanguageData.HomeFoodPolicy.headerTip: The food policy this pawn will revert to when arriving at a player home map.
LanguageData.CaravanFoodPolicy.label: caravan food policy
LanguageData.CaravanFoodPolicy.headerTip: The food policy this pawn will automatically switch to when forming a caravan.
